creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg in honor of Elizabeth K. Mix (Menon)
life_date: Alfred Grévin, French, Epineuil, Bourgogne 1827–Saint-Mandé, Ile-de-France 1892
provenance: [Arsène Bonafous-Murat, Paris, until about 1994; sold to Mix]; Elizabeth Mix, Indianapolis (given to Weisbergs); Yvonne and Gabriel Weisberg, Minneapolis (until 2018; given to Mia)
title: Untitled (Costume study)
